hadith.text: It was narrated from Abu Malik Al-Ashja'i that his father said:"I prayed behind the Messenger of Allah (ï·º) and he did not say the Qunut, and I prayed behind Abu Bakr and he did not say the Qunut, and I prayed behind Umar and he did not say the Qunut, and I prayed behind Uthman and he did not say the Qunut, and I prayed behind Ali and he did not say the Qunut."
